text: Table 10: Indicators of performance-based funding for upper secondary’ vocational education and training in 2006 _ (%>) Indicators Weight of indicator in 2006 Effectiveness Employment 40 Further studies (in higher education) 15 Processes Dropping out 15 % ratio of qualification certificate holders to entrants 13 Staff Formal teaching qualifications 11 Staff development 6 Source: Finnish National Board of Education, 2006 (l2).
